Alter Column.Description: This action is used to Alter a Column in Columnar Report. This works only display mode.
Alter Column.Name: Alter Column

Cancel.Description: This action is used in Edit Mode to Cancel the current Voucher Object.
Cancel.Name: Cancel

Create Column.Description: This action is used to Create a Column in Columnar Report. This works only display mode.
Create Column.Name: Create Column

Delete.Description: This action is used in Edit Mode to Delete the Current Object .
Delete.Name: Delete

Delete Column.Description: This action is used to Delete  a Column in Columnar Report.This works only display mode.
Delete Column.Name: Delete Column

Form Accept.Description: This action is used to accept the form and the control is returned back to the Report or Menu from where the Form is called.
Form Accept.Name: Form Accept

Form End.Description: This action takes cursor to the Last field in edit mode. In Display mode it takes the cursor to the Last Scrolled line of the form.
Form End.Name: Form End

Form Home.Description: This action takes the cursor to the First field in edit mode. In the Display mode it takes cursor to the First Scrolled line of the form.
Form Home.Name: Form Home

Form Query Reject.Description: This action is used to reject the form after the query (Quit Y / N). If it is 'N' then it goes back to current location else it rejects the form and the control returns back.
Form Query Reject.Name: Form Query Reject

Form Reject.Description: This action is used to reject the form and the control is returned back to the Report or Menu from where the Form is called.
Form Reject.Name: Form Reject

Form Reject to Menu.Description: This action is used to reject the form and the control returns back  directly to its menu.

Meta.Aliases: Form Reject to Menu, Menu Unconditional Reject

Form Reject to Menu.Name: Form Reject to Menu

Form Select End.Description: This action selects all the line from the current focused line to the last line at the bottom of the form.
Form Select End.Name: Form Select End

Form Select Home.Description: This action selects all the line from the current focused line to the first line at the top of the form.
Form Select Home.Name: Form Select Home

Form Select Range.Description: This action selects all the line from the focused line to the line where mouse is clicked.
Form Select Range.Name: Form Select Range

Message Box.Description: This action is used to display a message to the user. On Pressing any key, it returns to the calling screen.
Message Box.Name: Message Box

Remove Line.Description: This action is used to remove a line.
Remove Line.Name: Remove Line

Show Last Removed Line.Description: This action is used to restore last removed line.
Show Last Removed Line.Name: Show Last Removed Line

Show Removed Lines.Description: This action is used to restore all removed lines.
Show Removed Lines.Name: Show Removed Lines
